H0.text: What is the name for a person who tried to turn base metals into gold. Chrysopoeist

H1.text: What is the name for a person who tried to turn base metals into gold. Metallurgist

H2.text: What is the name for a person who tried to turn base metals into gold. Transmuter

H3.text: What is the name for a person who tried to turn base metals into gold. Alchemi

A4.text: In alchemy, the term chrysopoeia refers to the artificial production of gold, most commonly by the alleged transmutation of base metals such as lead.
